name: The True Story of the French Revolution
name_original: The True Story of the French Revolution
description:
1789 : Paris is burning ... In this short adventure, you will discover the events of the French Revolution as they really happened. These events were deliberately erased from the history books to give France a glorious image. It is time to reveal the truth...

This is our second game, please take it with a sense of humor. As French, we can confirm that nobody in France is walking with a baguette and a bêret.

Don't hesitate to give us your feedback !

  • Playable on : Firefox (tested) / Chrome (tested but laggy)
  • Not playable on : Brave (tested)

License
